mapper.select:
SELECT T2.CNTR_NO /* 계약번호 */ , T2.CNTR_SN /* 계약일련번호 */ , T2.CNTR_NO || T2.CNTR_SN AS CNTR_DTL_NO /* 계약상세번호 */ , MAX(T1.BILL_DLPNR_NM) AS MCON_BZS_NM /* 거래처명 */ , MAX(BILL_RMK_CN) AS BILL_RMK_CN /* 어음구분 */ , SUM(T2.BILL_DP_AMT) AS BILL_DP_AMT /* 입금액 */ , T1.BILL_RCP_DT /* 접수일자 */ , T3.CNTR_CST_NO , MAX(T4.BZRNO) AS BZRNO /* 사업자등록번호 */ , T1.BILL_BND_NO /* 채권번호 */ , T1.BILL_BND_AMT /* 채권금액 */ , T1.BILL_EXPR_DT /* 만기일자 */ , COUNT(T2.CNTR_SN) AS CNTR_COUNT /* 계약수 */ , T1.ITG_DP_NO /* 통합입금번호 */ , MAX(T1.BILL_DP_SAP_SLPNO) AS BILL_DP_SAP_SLPNO /* 입금전표번호 */ , MAX(T1.BILL_RPLC_SAP_SLPNO) AS BILL_RPLC_SAP_SLPNO /* 대체전표번호 */ , MAX(SELL_BZS_BZRNO) AS SELL_BZS_BZRNO /* 판매업체사업자등록번호 */ , MAX(PBL_BZS_BZRNO) AS PBL_BZS_BZRNO /* 발행업체사업자등록번호 */ FROM TB_RVDW_BILL_DP_IZ T1 /* 어음입금내역 */ LEFT JOIN TB_RVDW_BILL_DP_CNTR_REL_IZ T2 /* 어음입금계약관계내역 */ ON T2.ITG_DP_NO = T1.ITG_DP_NO /* 통합입금번호 */ AND T2.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' LEFT JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_BAS T3 /* 계약기본 */ ON T3.CNTR_NO = T2.CNTR_NO AND T3.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' LEFT JOIN TB_CUBS_CST_BAS T4 /* 고객기본 */ ON T4.CST_NO = T3.CNTR_CST_NO AND T4.COPN_DV_CD = '2' /* 법인격구분코드 - 법인 */ AND T4.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' WHERE 1 = 1 AND T1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N'
AND T1.BILL_RCP_DT >= #{rcpStartDt}
AND T1.BILL_RCP_DT <= #{rcpEndDt}
AND T1.BILL_EXPR_DT >= TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE,+1),'YYYYMMDD')
AND T1.BILL_EXPR_DT <= TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE,+1),'YYYYMMDD')
AND T2.CNTR_NO||T2.CNTR_SN LIKE '%'||#{cntr}||'%'
GROUP BY T1.ITG_DP_NO /* 통합입금번호 */ , T2.CNTR_NO /* 계약번호*/ , T2.CNTR_SN /* 계약일련번호 */ , T3.CNTR_CST_NO , T1.BILL_RCP_DT /* 접수일자 */ , T1.BILL_BND_NO /* 채권번호 */ , T1.BILL_BND_AMT /* 채권금액 */ , T1.BILL_EXPR_DT /* 만기일자 */ ORDER BY T1.ITG_DP_NO DESC
mapper.update:
UPDATE TB_RVDW_BILL_DP_IZ SET BILL_BND_NO = #{billBndNo} /* 어음채권번호 */ , BILL_RMK_CN = #{billRmkCn} /* 어음비고내용 */ , BILL_RCP_DT = #{billRcpDt} /* 어음접수일자 o */ , BILL_EXPR_DT = #{billExprDt} /* 어음만기일자 */ , SELL_BZS_BZRNO = #{sellBzsBzrno} /* 판매업체사업자등록번호 */ , PBL_BZS_BZRNO = #{pblBzsBzrno}/* 발행업체사업자등록번호 */
WHERE 1 = 1 AND ITG_DP_NO = #{itgDpNo}

UPDATE TB_RVDW_BILL_DP_IZ
SET BILL_DP_SAP_SLPNO = #{billDpSapSlpno} /* 어음입금SAP전표번호 */
SET BILL_RPLC_SAP_SLPNO = #{billRplcSapSlpno} /* 어음대체SAP전표번호 */
WHERE 1 = 1 AND ITG_DP_NO = #{itgDpNo} AND BILL_BND_NO = #{billBndNo} AND DTA_DL_YN = 'N'
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM TB_RVDW_BILL_DP_CNTR_REL_IZ WHERE 1 = 1 AND ITG_DP_NO = #{itgDpNo}
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO TB_RVDW_RVE_AK_DTL ( KW_GRP_CO_CD , RVE_AK_NO , RVE_AK_SN , DP_DV_CD , DP_MES_CD , DP_TP_CD , RVE_DV_CD , RVE_BIZ_DV_CD , RVE_CD , OG_ID , OG_TP_CD , PRTNR_NO , CNTR_NO , CNTR_SN , PD_CD , RVE_AK_AMT , RVE_AMT , RVE_STAT_CD , BILL_BND_NO , RVE_CO_CD , INCMDC_YN
) SELECT T2.KW_GRP_CO_CD /*교원그룹회사코드*/ , #{rveAkNo} AS RVE_AK_NO /*수납요청번호*/ , ROWNUM AS RVE_AK_SN
, T2.DP_DV_CD /*입금구분코드*/ , T2.DP_MES_CD /*입금수단코드*/ , T2.DP_TP_CD /*입금유형코드*/ , '03' AS RVE_DV_CD /*수납구분코드*/ , #{rveBizDvCd} AS RVE_BIZ_DV_CD /*수납업무구분코드*/ , T2.RVE_CD /*수납코드*/ , T2.OG_ID /*조직ID*/ , T2.OG_TP_CD /*조직유형코드*/ , T2.PRTNR_NO /*파트너번호*/ , T1.CNTR_NO /*계약번호*/ , T1.CNTR_SN /*계약일련번호*/ , T3.BASE_PD_CD /*상품코드*/ , T1.BILL_DP_AMT AS RVE_AK_AMT /*수납요청금액*/ , T1.BILL_DP_AMT AS RVE_AMT /*수납금액*/ , '02' AS RVE_STAT_CD /*수납상태코드*/ , T1.BILL_BND_NO /*어음채권번호*/ , T2.KW_GRP_CO_CD AS RVE_CO_CD /*수납회사코드*/ , NVL(T4.PD_PRP_VAL01,'N') AS INCMDC_YN /*N 비소득 , Y소득 소득공제여부*/
FROM ( SELECT S1.CNTR_NO , S1.CNTR_SN , S1.BILL_DP_AMT , S2.BILL_BND_NO , S1.ITG_DP_NO FROM TB_RVDW_BILL_DP_CNTR_REL_IZ S1 JOIN TB_RVDW_BILL_DP_IZ S2 ON ( S2.ITG_DP_NO = S1.ITG_DP_NO AND S2.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' ) WHERE 1 = 1 AND S1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' ) T1 JOIN TB_RVDW_ITG_DP_BAS T2 ON ( T2.ITG_DP_NO = T1.ITG_DP_NO AND T2.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' ) JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_DTL T3 ON ( T3.CNTR_NO = T1.CNTR_NO AND T3.CNTR_SN = T1.CNTR_SN AND T3.DTA_DL_YN = 'N') LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_PDBS_PD_ECOM_PRP_DTL T4 ON T4.PD_CD = T3.BASE_PD_CD AND T4.PD_EXTS_PRP_GRP_CD ='STLM' AND T4.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' WHERE 1 = 1 AND T1.ITG_DP_NO = #{itgDpNo} AND T1.CNTR_NO = #{cntrNo} AND T1.CNTR_SN = #{cntrSn} ORDER BY T1.CNTR_NO , T1.CNTR_SN
mapper.select:
SELECT ZZSNUM ,ZKEY ,ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY SHKZG DESC, KUNNR) AS LINESEQ /*전표라인번호*/ ,IFNUM ,ZZAVFLG ,BLART ,BUKRS ,ZZUSER ,BUDAT ,BLDAT ,BKTXT ,SHKZG ,LIFNR ,KUNNR ,WRBTR ,UMSKZ ,HKONT ,EMPFB ,BVTYP ,WMWST ,MWSKZ ,BRANCH ,WTQSSHH ,INCOMAMT ,INHABAMT ,WITHCD ,SECCO ,GSBER ,SGTXT ,ZFBDT ,KOSTL ,POSID ,XREF1 ,XREF2 ,XREF3 ,ZZPRDHA ,PRCTR ,AUGBL ,BELNR ,STBLG ,FUND ,KOINH ,BANKK ,BANKN ,MESSGE ,TRDAT ,REDAT ,ZFCGUB ,ZFIDPT ,ZFIMAN ,ZFSYMD ,ZFRYMD ,ZFETC1 ,ZFETC2 ,ZFETC3 ,FIEYMD ,FIEHMS ,FIMYMD ,FIMHMS FROM ( SELECT #{zzsnum} AS ZZSNUM /*전송번호*/ , LPAD('1' , 6 , '0') AS ZKEY /*전표번호*/ , '' AS IFNUM /*IF정보*/ , '5' AS ZZAVFLG /*증빙구분*/ , 'ZA' AS BLART /*전표유형*/ , '2000' AS BUKRS /*회사코드*/ , LPAD(#{session.employeeIDNumber}, 6, '0') AS ZZUSER /*입력자사번*/ , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE , 'YYYYMMDD') AS BUDAT /*전기일 - 대사일*/ , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE , 'YYYYMMDD') AS BLDAT /*증빙일 - 대사일*/ , '외담대매출채권 렌탈입금' AS BKTXT /*전표적요*/ , 'D' AS SHKZG /*차대구분 - 차변*/ , '1000000010' AS LIFNR /*구매처*/ , '1000000010' AS KUNNR /*고객*/ , #{wrbtr} AS WRBTR /*금액*/ , '' AS UMSKZ /*특별지시자*/ , '1112414' AS HKONT /*GL계정*/ , '' AS EMPFB /*대체지급인*/ , '' AS BVTYP /*지급계좌키*/ , 0 AS WMWST /*부가세금액*/ , '' AS MWSKZ /*부가세코드*/ , '' AS BRANCH /*부가세사업장*/ , 0 AS WTQSSHH /*원천세표준액*/ , 0 AS INCOMAMT /*소득세금액*/ , 0 AS INHABAMT /*주민세금액*/ , '' AS WITHCD /*원천세코드*/ , '' AS SECCO /*섹션코드*/ , '1210' AS GSBER /*사업영역*/ , T1.BILL_DLPNR_NM ||' 외담대매출채권 렌탈입금' AS SGTXT /*항목적요*/ , T1.BILL_EXPR_DT AS ZFBDT /*지급기산일*/ , '200385' AS KOSTL /*코스트센터*/ , '' AS POSID /*WBS*/ , '' AS XREF1 /*참조1*/ , '' AS XREF2 /*참조2*/ , '' AS XREF3 /*참조3*/ , '' AS ZZPRDHA /*제품계층구조*/ , '' AS PRCTR /*손익센터*/ , '' AS AUGBL /*반제원전표번*/ , '' AS BELNR /*SAP전표번호*/ , '' AS STBLG /*SAP역분개전표*/ , NVL((SELECT MAX(SAP_BZ_CAPAM_CD) FROM TB_CBCL_DG_CST_ID_BAS WHERE DG_CST_ID = '1000000010' ),'203') AS FUND /*자금*/ , '' AS KOINH /*예금주*/ , '' AS BANKK /*은행코드*/ , '' AS BANKN /*계좌번호*/ , '' AS MESSGE /*SAP전표메시지*/ , '' AS TRDAT /*전송일*/ , '' AS REDAT /*반영일자*/ , '' AS ZFCGUB /*취소여부*/ , '' AS ZFIDPT /*작성부서*/ , '' AS ZFIMAN /*작성담당*/ , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD') AS ZFSYMD /*전송일자*/ , '' AS ZFRYMD /*수신일자*/ , '' AS ZFETC1 /*기타1*/ , '' AS ZFETC2 /*기타2*/ , '' AS ZFETC3 /*기타3*/ , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD') AS FIEYMD /*입력일자*/ , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'HH24MISS') AS FIEHMS /*입력시간*/ , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD') AS FIMYMD /*수정일자*/ , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'HH24MISS') AS FIMHMS /*수정시간*/ FROM TB_RVDW_BILL_DP_IZ T1 WHERE 1 = 1 AND T1.ITG_DP_NO = #{itgDpNo} AND T1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N'
UNION ALL
SELECT #{zzsnum} AS ZZSNUM /*전송번호*/ , LPAD('1' , 6 , '0') AS ZKEY /*전표번호*/ , '' AS IFNUM /*IF정보*/ , '5' AS ZZAVFLG /*증빙구분*/ , 'ZA' AS BLART /*전표유형*/ , '2000' AS BUKRS /*회사코드*/ , LPAD(#{session.employeeIDNumber}, 6, '0') AS ZZUSER /*입력자사번*/ , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE , 'YYYYMMDD') AS BUDAT /*전기일 - 대사일*/ , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE , 'YYYYMMDD') AS BLDAT /*증빙일 - 대사일*/ , '외담대매출채권 렌탈입금' AS BKTXT /*전표적요*/ , 'C' AS SHKZG /*차대구분 - 차변*/ , '1000000010' AS LIFNR /*구매처*/ , '1000000010' AS KUNNR /*고객*/ , #{wrbtr} AS WRBTR /*금액*/ , '' AS UMSKZ /*특별지시자*/ , '2100501' AS HKONT /*GL계정*/ , '' AS EMPFB /*대체지급인*/ , '' AS BVTYP /*지급계좌키*/ , 0 AS WMWST /*부가세금액*/ , '' AS MWSKZ /*부가세코드*/ , '' AS BRANCH /*부가세사업장*/ , 0 AS WTQSSHH /*원천세표준액*/ , 0 AS INCOMAMT /*소득세금액*/ , 0 AS INHABAMT /*주민세금액*/ , '' AS WITHCD /*원천세코드*/ , '' AS SECCO /*섹션코드*/ , '1210' AS GSBER /*사업영역*/ , T1.BILL_DLPNR_NM ||' 외담대매출채권 렌탈입금' AS SGTXT /*항목적요*/ , T1.BILL_EXPR_DT AS ZFBDT /*지급기산일*/ , '200385' AS KOSTL /*코스트센터*/ , '' AS POSID /*WBS*/ , '' AS XREF1 /*참조1*/ , '' AS XREF2 /*참조2*/ , '' AS XREF3 /*참조3*/ , '' AS ZZPRDHA /*제품계층구조*/ , '' AS PRCTR /*손익센터*/ , '' AS AUGBL /*반제원전표번*/ , '' AS BELNR /*SAP전표번호*/ , '' AS STBLG /*SAP역분개전표*/ , NVL((SELECT MAX(SAP_BZ_CAPAM_CD) FROM TB_CBCL_DG_CST_ID_BAS WHERE DG_CST_ID = '1000000010' ),'203') AS FUND /*자금*/ , '' AS KOINH /*예금주*/ , '' AS BANKK /*은행코드*/ , '' AS BANKN /*계좌번호*/ , '' AS MESSGE /*SAP전표메시지*/ , '' AS TRDAT /*전송일*/ , '' AS REDAT /*반영일자*/ , '' AS ZFCGUB /*취소여부*/ , '' AS ZFIDPT /*작성부서*/ , '' AS ZFIMAN /*작성담당*/ , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD') AS ZFSYMD /*전송일자*/ , '' AS ZFRYMD /*수신일자*/ , '' AS ZFETC1 /*기타1*/ , '' AS ZFETC2 /*기타2*/ , '' AS ZFETC3 /*기타3*/ , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD') AS FIEYMD /*입력일자*/ , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'HH24MISS') AS FIEHMS /*입력시간*/ , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD') AS FIMYMD /*수정일자*/ , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'HH24MISS') AS FIMHMS /*수정시간*/ FROM TB_RVDW_BILL_DP_IZ T1 WHERE 1 = 1 AND T1.ITG_DP_NO = #{itgDpNo} AND T1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' )

SELECT ZZSNUM , ZKEY , ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY SHKZG DESC, KUNNR) AS LINESEQ /*전표라인번호*/ , IFNUM , ZZAVFLG , BLART , BUKRS , ZZUSER , BUDAT , BLDAT , BKTXT , SHKZG , LIFNR , KUNNR , WRBTR , UMSKZ , HKONT , EMPFB , BVTYP , WMWST , MWSKZ , BRANCH , WTQSSHH , INCOMAMT , INHABAMT , WITHCD , SECCO , GSBER , SGTXT , ZFBDT , KOSTL , POSID , XREF1 , XREF2 , XREF3 , ZZPRDHA , PRCTR , AUGBL , BELNR , STBLG , FUND , KOINH , BANKK , BANKN , MESSGE , TRDAT , REDAT , ZFCGUB , ZFIDPT , ZFIMAN , ZFSYMD , ZFRYMD , ZFETC1 , ZFETC2 , ZFETC3 , FIEYMD , FIEHMS , FIMYMD , FIMHMS FROM ( SELECT #{zzsnum} AS ZZSNUM /*전송번호*/ , LPAD('1' , 6 , '0') AS ZKEY /*전표번호*/ , '' AS IFNUM /*IF정보*/ , '5' AS ZZAVFLG /*증빙구분*/ , 'S3' AS BLART /*전표유형*/ , '2000' AS BUKRS /*회사코드*/ , LPAD(#{session.employeeIDNumber}, 6, '0') AS ZZUSER /*입력자사번*/ , TO_CHAR(LAST_DAY(TO_DATE(BILL_EXPR_DT,'YYYYMMDD')),'YYYYMMDD') AS BUDAT/*전기일-12월31일*/ , TO_CHAR(LAST_DAY(TO_DATE(BILL_EXPR_DT,'YYYYMMDD')),'YYYYMMDD') AS BLDAT/*증빙일-12월31일*/ , '렌탈 어음발행 만기입금' AS BKTXT /*전표적요*/ , 'D' AS SHKZG /*차대구분 - 차변*/ , '9110303' AS LIFNR /*구매처*/ , '9110303' AS KUNNR /*고객*/ , #{wrbtr} AS WRBTR /*금액*/ , '' AS UMSKZ /*특별지시자*/ , '9110303' AS HKONT /*GL계정*/ , '' AS EMPFB /*대체지급인*/ , '' AS BVTYP /*지급계좌키*/ , 0 AS WMWST /*부가세금액*/ , '' AS MWSKZ /*부가세코드*/ , '' AS BRANCH /*부가세사업장*/ , 0 AS WTQSSHH /*원천세표준액*/ , 0 AS INCOMAMT /*소득세금액*/ , 0 AS INHABAMT /*주민세금액*/ , '' AS WITHCD /*원천세코드*/ , '' AS SECCO /*섹션코드*/ , '1210' AS GSBER /*사업영역*/ , T1.BILL_DLPNR_NM ||' 렌탈 어음발행 만기입금' AS SGTXT /*항목적요*/ , TO_CHAR(LAST_DAY(TO_DATE(BILL_EXPR_DT,'YYYYMMDD')),'YYYYMMDD') AS ZFBDT /*지급기산일-12월31일*/ , '200092' AS KOSTL /*코스트센터*/ , '' AS POSID /*WBS*/ , '' AS XREF1 /*참조1*/ , '' AS XREF2 /*참조2*/ , '' AS XREF3 /*참조3*/ , '' AS ZZPRDHA /*제품계층구조*/ , '' AS PRCTR /*손익센터*/ , '' AS AUGBL /*반제원전표번*/ , '' AS BELNR /*SAP전표번호*/ , '' AS STBLG /*SAP역분개전표*/ , NVL((SELECT MAX(SAP_BZ_CAPAM_CD) FROM TB_CBCL_DG_CST_ID_BAS WHERE DG_CST_ID = '9110303' ),'203') AS FUND /*자금*/ , '' AS KOINH /*예금주*/ , '' AS BANKK /*은행코드*/ , '' AS BANKN /*계좌번호*/ , '' AS MESSGE /*SAP전표메시지*/ , '' AS TRDAT /*전송일*/ , '' AS REDAT /*반영일자*/ , '' AS ZFCGUB /*취소여부*/ , '' AS ZFIDPT /*작성부서*/ , '' AS ZFIMAN /*작성담당*/ , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD') AS ZFSYMD /*전송일자*/ , '' AS ZFRYMD /*수신일자*/ , '' AS ZFETC1 /*기타1*/ , '' AS ZFETC2 /*기타2*/ , '' AS ZFETC3 /*기타3*/ , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD') AS FIEYMD /*입력일자*/ , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'HH24MISS') AS FIEHMS /*입력시간*/ , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD') AS FIMYMD /*수정일자*/ , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'HH24MISS') AS FIMHMS /*수정시간*/ FROM TB_RVDW_BILL_DP_IZ T1 WHERE 1 = 1 AND T1.ITG_DP_NO = #{itgDpNo} AND T1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N'
UNION ALL
SELECT #{zzsnum} AS ZZSNUM /*전송번호*/ , LPAD('1' , 6 , '0') AS ZKEY /*전표번호*/ , '' AS IFNUM /*IF정보*/ , '5' AS ZZAVFLG /*증빙구분*/ , 'S3' AS BLART /*전표유형*/ , '2000' AS BUKRS /*회사코드*/ , LPAD(#{session.employeeIDNumber}, 6, '0') AS ZZUSER /*입력자사번*/ , TO_CHAR(LAST_DAY(TO_DATE(BILL_EXPR_DT,'YYYYMMDD')),'YYYYMMDD') AS BUDAT/*전기일-12월31일*/ , TO_CHAR(LAST_DAY(TO_DATE(BILL_EXPR_DT,'YYYYMMDD')),'YYYYMMDD') AS BLDAT/*증빙일-12월31일*/ , '렌탈 어음발행 만기입금' AS BKTXT /*전표적요*/ , 'C' AS SHKZG /*차대구분 - 차변*/ , '1000000010' AS LIFNR /*구매처*/ , '1000000010' AS KUNNR /*고객*/ , #{wrbtr} AS WRBTR /*금액*/ , '' AS UMSKZ /*특별지시자*/ , '2100501' AS HKONT /*GL계정*/ , '' AS EMPFB /*대체지급인*/ , '' AS BVTYP /*지급계좌키*/ , 0 AS WMWST /*부가세금액*/ , '' AS MWSKZ /*부가세코드*/ , '' AS BRANCH /*부가세사업장*/ , 0 AS WTQSSHH /*원천세표준액*/ , 0 AS INCOMAMT /*소득세금액*/ , 0 AS INHABAMT /*주민세금액*/ , '' AS WITHCD /*원천세코드*/ , '' AS SECCO /*섹션코드*/ , '1210' AS GSBER /*사업영역*/ , T1.BILL_DLPNR_NM ||' 렌탈 어음발행 만기입금' AS SGTXT /*항목적요*/ , TO_CHAR(LAST_DAY(TO_DATE(BILL_EXPR_DT,'YYYYMMDD')),'YYYYMMDD') AS ZFBDT /*지급기산일-12월31일*/ , '200092' AS KOSTL /*코스트센터*/ , '' AS POSID /*WBS*/ , '' AS XREF1 /*참조1*/ , '' AS XREF2 /*참조2*/ , '' AS XREF3 /*참조3*/ , '' AS ZZPRDHA /*제품계층구조*/ , '' AS PRCTR /*손익센터*/ , '' AS AUGBL /*반제원전표번*/ , '' AS BELNR /*SAP전표번호*/ , '' AS STBLG /*SAP역분개전표*/ , NVL((SELECT MAX(SAP_BZ_CAPAM_CD) FROM TB_CBCL_DG_CST_ID_BAS WHERE DG_CST_ID = '1000000010' ),'203') AS FUND /*자금*/ , '' AS KOINH /*예금주*/ , '' AS BANKK /*은행코드*/ , '' AS BANKN /*계좌번호*/ , '' AS MESSGE /*SAP전표메시지*/ , '' AS TRDAT /*전송일*/ , '' AS REDAT /*반영일자*/ , '' AS ZFCGUB /*취소여부*/ , '' AS ZFIDPT /*작성부서*/ , '' AS ZFIMAN /*작성담당*/ , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD') AS ZFSYMD /*전송일자*/ , '' AS ZFRYMD /*수신일자*/ , '' AS ZFETC1 /*기타1*/ , '' AS ZFETC2 /*기타2*/ , '' AS ZFETC3 /*기타3*/ , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD') AS FIEYMD /*입력일자*/ , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'HH24MISS') AS FIEHMS /*입력시간*/ , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD') AS FIMYMD /*수정일자*/ , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'HH24MISS') AS FIMHMS /*수정시간*/ FROM TB_RVDW_BILL_DP_IZ T1 WHERE 1 = 1 AND T1.ITG_DP_NO = #{itgDpNo} AND T1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' )
